name: Gravitron 3000
description:
A mind bending 2d puzzle platformer inspired by games such as Portal and Super Meat Boy. Pay what you want for the full version below.
  • Gain full control over the direction of gravity.
  • Make your way through 30 challenging levels.
  • Think outside the box to pass seemingly impossible levels.
  • Original Music.
  • Die... A lot... and enjoy!...

This is my first game after starting to teach myself programming, in my spare time, about 2 years ago.

As far as I know, no one has been able to complete this game so if you manage to be the first, please let me know!

Pro tip: Remember to look around the level, you never know what you might find ;)

A big thanks to Jack Stirling and Jaymes Brown for creating the music for this game. Check them out at https://m.facebook.com/jackstirlingmusic/ and https://instagram.com/giacomo_marrone

Follow me on Twitter @chilli_e

Please let me know if you find any bugs, or what you did and didn't like about the game in the comments below.
